name: Christmas Tree Massacre
description:
You hate Christmas for some reason. Armed with your trusty wood chipper, unleash your fury, one tree at a time!

Hold X to use wood chipper, move with arrow keys

ESC crashes the game.

Homework for my CITA 280 class, based off this tutorial http://www.madwomb.com/tutorials/GameDesign_UnityScripting.html

BGM is a midi of Mariah Carey's "All I Want for Christmas is You"
